user_instruction: 'Assist me in responding to Alex Johnson'"'"'s email about the exam topics (alex.johnson@uniriv.edu). You can check out my Gmail and NotionManager for information.'

formatted_items.content:
I found an email from Alex Johnson where they requested clarification regarding the topics covered in the upcoming exam. Unfortunately, I could not find any relevant information on exam topics in your Notion workspace.

Here is Alex's request:
---
**Subject**: Clarification on Exam Topics  
**Body**:
> Dear Professor Doe,  
>   
> I hope this message finds you well. I am reaching out to request some clarification regarding the topics that will be covered in our upcoming exam. I want to ensure that I am studying the right material and would greatly appreciate any guidance you could provide on the key areas to focus on.  
>   
> Thank you for your time and assistance.  
>   
> Best regards,  
> Alex Johnson  

Would you like me to draft your response now? If so, let me know any specific topics or information you want to include!
